task.title: Open, edit and revise a document

context.p: The Bricsys 24/7 Transfer Tool allows you to open a document from the Bricsys 24/7 Service on your device. This allows you to change the document immediately and upload it directly to Bricsys 24/7 as a revision.

step.cmd: Double-click on a document in the Bricsys 24/7 screen to save and open a copy on your local device.
step.stepresult:
A green dot appears next to the file name.
Open a document

step.cmd: Edit and save the document on your local device.
step.stepresult: An orange dot appears next to the file name.

step.cmd: Right-click on the edited document and select the upload as revision action to upload the edited document as a revision of the original document in Bricsys 24/7.
